text:
Enquanto subia as ruelas que davam no alto do Sacromonte, sentia o vento no rosto e o tilintar dos ornamentos pendurados nas portas. Objetos com uma graça marroquina, que em sua terra ela sabia que afugentavam maus espíritos.
Quase flutuava quando levou um súbito esbarrão de alguém que descia correndo. Aparentava estar em um ato de fuga. Quando se deteve para olhar o indivíduo que quase a atropelara: um susto. Era um dos homens que a havia trazido até ali em sua carroça. Apertou a verbena com os dedos e esfregou o odor no centro da testa. Estranha coincidência. Seguiu o homem com os olhos enquanto este descia afoito até que ele desapareceu na última curva. E quase ouviu um comerciante judeu gritar seu nome. [redacted_name], pareceu escutar. Seria bom estar atenta a essa figura.
trans:
As she climbed the narrow streets leading up to the top of Sacromonte, she felt the wind on her face and the tinkling of ornaments hanging from the doors. Objects with a Moorish charm that, in her own land, she knew warded off evil spirits.
She was almost floating when she was suddenly bumped into by someone running down, who seemed to be in a hurry to escape. When she stopped to look at the individual who had nearly knocked her over, she was startled. It was one of the men who had brought her there in his carriage. She squeezed the verbena between her fingers and rubbed the scent on her forehead. A strange coincidence. She followed the man with her eyes as he hurried down until he disappeared around the last corner. And she almost heard a Jewish merchant call out his name. [redacted_name], seemed to hear. She should keep an eye on this figure.
